mapper.select: select * from shield order by shield_userid=#{id} asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shield(user_id,shield_userid) SELECT #{userId}, #{shieldUserid} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT user_id,shield_userid FROM follow WHERE user_id = #{userId} and shield_userid=#{shieldUserid})
mapper.delete: delete from shield where user_id=#{userId} and shield_userid =#{shieldUserid}
